body_html:

'''grad_ctxt = graph._get_control_flow_context()'''

results in a None value for grad_ctxt.

body:
I still have this issue in r0.11.

I have a nested scan, and [line 197 in control_flow_grad.py](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/control_flow_grad.py#L197):

'''grad_ctxt = graph._get_control_flow_context()'''

results in a None value for grad_ctxt.
